item.title: Sweet Pepper & Cherry Tomatoes
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 2 long sweet peppers
  • 8 cherry tomatoes
  • 1 clove of garlic, peeled
  • 4 tabllespoons of olive oil
  • salt & pepper

Preparation Method

item.title: Martha Stewart's One Pot Tomato Pasta
item.description:
Serves 4 [2 in brackets]

Ingredients :

  • 12 [6] ozs. Linguine (or any other dry pasta)
  • 12 [6] ozs. Cherry Tomatoes (halfed or quartered)
  • 1 thinly sliced [or chopped for Keith!] Onion
  • 4 cloves thinly sliced Garlic
  • 1/2 teaspoon red-pepper flakes
  • 2 sprigs Basil
  • 2 [1] tablespoon Olive Oil
  • Salt & Pepper, to taste
  • 4 1/2 [2 1/4] cups of cold water (36 fluid ounces [18])

Parmesan & Basil Leaves for serving
